name: codeplayground
description: Share your code and collaborate with developers around the world.
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy: marshmallow -o docs -i artwork.psd -t Codeplayground -f -m && inject-ga docs/index.html -o docs/index.html -c 'UA-24389952-17' && surge -d codeplayground.co -p dist
scripts.deploy:staging: marshmallow -o docs -i artwork.psd -t Codeplayground -f -m && inject-ga docs/index.html -o docs/index.html -c 'UA-24389952-17' && surge -d codeplayground.surge.sh -p dist
scripts.test: nyc ava && eslint . -c styled --ignore-path .gitignore && editorconfig-tools check .
